name: Abbotsford Nights - EP
description:
We've just spent a whopping two - eight hour days in the studio recording our debut EP "Abbotsford Nights"The EP mixes infectious melody with slimy guitar parts, topped with some hunky drumming and also some grouse bass parts. 

Malcolm Crampturd; president of Capalaba greyhound racing described Bright Lights as "What is a Bright Lights?" as he had never heard of them. 

MALCOLM CRAMPTURD ENDORSED.

*The EP comes in a sweet cardboard wallet with a gnarly 8 page booklet full of photos recording this bischhh. Great day.
